Topic.Title: Making enemy snake corpse child visible (Solved)

Posts.EditableText: So if im right I make the corpse visible by typing object.child  ? Otherwise i'm lost again sorry
Posts.HTML: So if im right I make the corpse visible by typing object.child ? Otherwise i'm lost again sorry

Posts.EditableText: I... don't think so? You do it by either directly setting object.visible to True (Not "True", True) or using the Make Object Visible block.
Posts.HTML: I... don't think so? You do it by either directly setting object.visible to True (Not "True", True) or using the Make Object Visible block.
